synopsis.text: Beltram Kingdom's slums are home to Rio, a resilient seven-year-old orphan grappling with the memories of his past life as Haruto Amakawa, a Japanese university student. The fusion of their identities unveils Rio's newfound magical abilities and a deep-seated desire for vengeance against his mother's killers. When he inadvertently thwarts a kidnapping of the kingdom's princess, Rio is granted a scholarship to the prestigious Royal Academy, a school reserved for the nobility. As he navigates the challenges of his new life, Rio must confront the complexities of a hierarchical society and harness his unique powers to shape his destiny in this world of swords and sorcery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
